getCurrentUserOperation

getUser

public User getUser()
Returns a new user if we are creating one or an existing user from DB if we are updating one.

Once question is instantiated (or readed from DB) next calls to this method will return that instance.

If you need to instantiate user again (or read it again from DB) you can set user to null, but be careful with possible side effects.

Returns:
A new user if we are creating one or an existing user from DB if we are editing one

getUser

private User getUser(HibernateUtil.Operation operation)
Returns a new user if we are creating one or an existing user from DB if we are updating one.

Once question is instantiated (or readed from DB) next calls to this method will return that instance.

If you need to instantiate user again (or read it again from DB) you can set user to null, but be careful with possible side effects.

Parameters:
operation - Operation
Returns:
A new user if we are creating one or an existing user from DB if we are editing one

isEnabledChecboxesSetters

public boolean isEnabledChecboxesSetters()
Check if setters for checkboxes are enabled or not.

Note that this is needed because of a bug of <p:wizard> component that always set properties for their checkboxes components as false when submitting the form.

Returns:
true if setters for checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise

setEnabledCheckboxesSetters

public void setEnabledCheckboxesSetters(boolean enabledCheckboxesSetters)
Enable or disable setters for checkboxes.

Note that this is needed because of a bug of <p:wizard> component that always set properties for their checkboxes components as false when submitting the form.

Parameters:
enabledCheckboxesSetters - true to enable setters for checkboxes, false to disable setters for checkboxes

abbreviate

public java.lang.String abbreviate(java.lang.String str,
                                   int maxLength)
Abbreviates a string using ellipses.

Leading and trailing whitespace are ignored.

When abbreviating a string, this method will try to leave a whitespace between the last non trimmed word and the ellipses if there is enough space.

Parameters:
str - String to abbreviate (if needed)
maxLength - Maximum length of the abbreviated string (but length of ellipses is taking account when we need to abbreviate it)
Returns:
Same string if its length is less or equal than maxLength or abbreviated string otherwise

abbreviateWords

public java.lang.String abbreviateWords(java.lang.String str,
                                        int maxWordLength)
Abbreviates words within a string using short ellipses.

Parameters:
str - String to abbreviate words (if needed)
maxWordLength - Maximum length of the abbreviated words
Returns:
Same string but with large words abbreviated

breakText

public java.lang.String breakText(java.lang.String text)
Parameters:
text - Text
Returns:
Same text but replacing '\n' characters with <br/> tags after escaping it using HTML entities

breakText

public java.lang.String breakText(java.lang.String text,
                                  int maxBreaks)
Parameters:
text - Text
maxBreaks - Maximum number of breaks allowed or 0 unlimited
Returns:
Same text but replacing '\n' characters with <br/> tags after escaping it using HTML entities

showConfirmCancelUserDialog

public void showConfirmCancelUserDialog(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event)
Action listener to show the dialog to confirm cancel of user creation/edition.

rollbackPermissionsConfirmedValues

private void rollbackPermissionsConfirmedValues(HibernateUtil.Operation operation)
Rollback permission values to the confirmed values.

We need to do this because navigation through <p:wizard> component can update values even when they are not still confirmed.

                              java.lang.String plainMessage)

Be careful that this method can only be invoked safely from non ajax actions.

errorCode - Error message (before localization)

changeLocale

public void changeLocale(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event)
Handle enabling/disabling setters for checkboxes if user changes locale.

Note that this is needed because of a bug of <p:wizard> component that always set properties for their checkboxes components as false when submitting the form.

Parameters:
event - Action event
